timeline.bodyText: Maybe we should change the name of clone method. Maybe newBuilder. (Because I didn't really want a Cloneable when adding that method.)
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: There should be a same class in core. May be we can remove this later.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -15,36 +16,34 @@
  * @param <T> a specific expandable enum type
  */
 public abstract class ExpandableStringEnum<T extends ExpandableStringEnum<T>> {

timeline.bodyText: Please detail on what happens here. transient should not be used lightly.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: The spotbugs said the CreatableResourcesImpl has two variable that cannot be serialized. After my search, it seems add transient can fix it.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

replies.bodyText:
Could you see if it is possible to convert the class to composition (use a HashMap var, instead of extends HashMap, then delegate other Map method to that var)? This way we should be able to get rid of Serializable interface.
Currently I didn't see the place that need the Serializable. Correct me if I am wrong.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: Changed extends to private var. Done
replies.author: ChenTanyi

timeline.bodyText: why parent()? maybe only delete this line?
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: Since the next line has resourceId.parent().name(), so I add parent() in it. Is it better not to check this NPE?
replies.author: ChenTanyi

timeline.bodyText: What error message associates with this?
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: The error message is we could not expose a protected / public variable that hasn't been used. So I add this function to use the variable.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

timeline.bodyText:
Currently the norm in sdk is to add it to suppression
  <Match>
    <Class name="~com\.microsoft\.azure\.keyvault\.requests\.\w+Request"/>
    <Bug pattern="BC_UNCONFIRMED_CAST_OF_RETURN_VALUE"/>
  </Match>

We could keep the annotation, and see what to do after more services get checked.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: Agree, if much more services meet such an error spotbugs, we could add it to suppression.
replies.author: ChenTanyi

timeline.message: feat: change clone name in rest client builder
feat: remove arm expand enum string
fix: change spotbugs annotation to latest
fix: revapi error for non public api
